attributes.action: Sharing or making indecent images of children you go to prison immediately
attributes.additional_details: Because children are who we should protect and safe guard no person who does this should not face the maximum sentence it’s a very serious matter that can’t be dealt with by means of a community order or suspended sentence
attributes.background: Amend the sentencing guidelines to protect our children

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700084
